name: Exotic Movie Locales Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following movies set in Africa stars John Wayne?
questions.explanation:
'Hatari!'.

	'Mogambo' stars Clark Gable. 'Out Of Africa' stars Robert Redford and Meryl Streep. 'I Dreamed Of Africa' is a Kim Basinger film.

questions.text: 'Stanley and Livingston' was also set (partly) in Africa. Who played Stanley?
questions.explanation:
Spencer Tracy.

	A damn good actor.

questions.text: 'The Sand Pebbles' starred Steve McQueen and was set in the Orient. Who was the female lead?
questions.explanation:
Candice Bergen.

	A very young Bergen. With Richard Crenna.

questions.text: 'Four Feathers' and 'Khartoum' are tales of action and adventure. Where does much of the action occur?
'Lawrence of Arabia' is a magnificent, sweeping epic. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Peter O'Toole.

	Excellent actor. He teamed with Burton in 'Becket'.

questions.text: The director of 'Lawrence of Arabia', David Lean, also directed 'Dr. Zhivago'. Who of the following was NOT in the cast of the latter?
questions.explanation:
James Mason.

	Starring Omar Sharif in the sweeping Russian epic.

questions.text: Although not 'exotic', Niagara Falls is a scenic backdrop for any movie. Who starred in 'Niagara'?
questions.explanation:
Marilyn Monroe.

	Early in her career.

questions.text: Which of these Hitchcock classics featured the scenic beauty of the French Riviera?
questions.explanation:
'To Catch a Thief'.

	Grace Kelly added to the scenic beauty.

questions.text: 'Ryan's Daughter' provided a scenic look at what country?
Where did the court-martial occur in 'Breaker Morant'?
questions.explanation:
Africa.

	South Africa, to be precise.
